effect.shortEffect: Raises Attack one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
effect.full: This Pokémon's Attack rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon. This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through poison or spikes. If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with mummy, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

description.black-white: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.black-2-white-2: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.x-y: Boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
